Inter Milan: Conte wants two players in January!
The technician would have set his priorities for January, with two players already identified.
01 Nov 2019, 22:12 by Rafael Da Silva



After two failures in C1 and C3, the Nerazzurri will try to do better for the coming season. The arrival of Antonio Conte is also synonymous with a new philosophy of play.Icon Sport



Samir HandanovicIcon Sport



Milan SkriniarIcon Sport



Stefan from VrijIcon Sport



Diego GodinIcon Sport



Kwadwo AsamoahIcon Sport



Nicolo BarellaIcon Sport



Radja NainggolanIcon Sport



Marcelo BrozovicIcon Sport



Valentino LazaroIcon Sport



Ivan PerisicIcon Sport



Lautaro MartinezIcon Sport

Inter Milan: the possible eleven of the season

This summer, Antonio Conte resumed service by taking a seat on the bench of Inter Milan. Good news for the Nerazzurri, determined to find the heights in Italy. And the least we can say is that the arrival of the Italian technician totally rebboost the club. Indeed, the club is currently second in Serie A and second in his group (of death) in the Champions League.




Arturo Vidal and Matteo Darmian tracked




Arturo Vidal returns to Italy? +12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

And according to information from the Gazzetta dello Sport, the former technician from Chelsea or Squadra Azzurra would intend to strengthen in the winter with the help of loans. According to the Italian daily, the latter would have identified the two players he would like to attract during this winter mercato: Arturo Vidal and Matteo Darmian. However, the daily also said that if these arrivals were to come true, the club should separate from Borja Valero and Valentino Lazaro. To be continued.
